title: Remove Copy Share Link UI and related notices (v12)

requirements.summary: Remove the in-app “Copy Share Link” control from all main screens by eliminating its rendering from the shared layout.
acceptanceCriteria: No button/control labeled "Copy Share Link" is visible anywhere in the app UI (PasswordGate, proposal screen, or YesTapSequence).
There is no remaining interactive element whose accessible name/aria-label is "Copy Share Link".

file_operations.description: Remove rendering of the CopyShareLinkAction from the shared layout overlay so it no longer appears on PasswordGate, the proposal view, or the YesTapSequence success view; also remove the associated import and any now-unneeded wrapper markup for that control.

requirements.summary: Remove the admin-link warning notice and any user-facing text that references “Copy Share Link”.
acceptanceCriteria: When the URL contains a caffeineAdminToken hash fragment, no admin-link notice is displayed.
No user-facing text in the app contains the phrase "Copy Share Link".

file_operations.description: Stop rendering the AdminLinkNotice in the shared layout overlay so no notice appears even when the URL hash contains caffeineAdminToken.
Remove the AdminLinkNotice component (it contains user-facing "Copy Share Link" text) so it cannot be rendered or referenced.

requirements.summary: Clean up unused share-link code and remove remaining references/imports to the removed components/utilities; ensure frontend builds cleanly.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend` compiles successfully with no TypeScript errors introduced by removing the share-link feature.
There are no remaining references/imports to the removed share-link UI components in the codebase.

file_operations.description: Remove the CopyShareLinkAction component entirely after it is no longer rendered anywhere.
Remove share-link utility functions that were only used by the removed CopyShareLinkAction.
Remove the admin-token detection hook after AdminLinkNotice is removed to avoid unused code and ensure the frontend builds without unused-import/TS errors.
Ensure all imports/references to CopyShareLinkAction and AdminLinkNotice are removed so the file compiles cleanly after deletions.
